data.actual_result: There is no padding between the words and the button border.
data.expected_result: The send friend request button should display nicely.
data.short_description: Send friend request button has unusually narrow padding in Japanese.
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure Discord is in Japanese. - Open a conversation with a non-friend. Double check you are not a friend with user. - Try to add user to a group DM.
